【追憶の中山記念】11年ヴィクトワールピサ 今思えば…日本競馬にとって大きな意味を持った壮行戦 (【Recalling the Nakayama Kinen】2011 Victoire Pisa: Looking back now... a send-off race that held great significance for Japanese racing.)
今年で第100回を迎える中山記念 節目の年は関東馬が6連勝中 (The Nakayama Kinen celebrates its 100th running this year. Kanto-based horses are on a 6-race winning streak in this milestone year.)

【中山記念】一昨年の2冠牝馬チェルヴィニアが軽快デモ 陣営「日に日に毛づやも良くなって良化傾向」 (【Nakayama Kinen】Cherivina, two-crown filly from the year before last, shows light demonstration. Connections: "Her coat is getting better day by day, showing improvement.")
【オーシャンＳ】定年の西園正師 ラスト重賞で集大成を ビッグシーザー＆フィオライアの２頭スタンバイ (【Ocean S】Retiring trainer Masato Nishizono aims for a culmination in his final graded race. Big Caesar & Fioraiya are standing by.)
【オーシャンS】ルガル仕上がる、前走レコードV鮫島克駿背に伸びた (【Ocean S】Lugal is ready. He stretched out under Katsuma Sameshima after a record-breaking win in his previous race.)
ドロップオブライト 次走は愛知杯へ (Drop of Light's next race is the Aichi Hai.)
【チューリップ賞】アランカール「取りこぼせない一戦」初コンビの武豊騎手で巻き返す (【Tulip Sho】Alankarl: "A race we can't afford to lose." Aims for a comeback with jockey Yutaka Take in their first partnership.)
“国枝改革”実った美浦新坂路 “西高東低”に抱いた危機感 ("Kunieda Reform" bears fruit at Miho's new uphill track. A sense of crisis felt due to "West Japan's superiority over East Japan.")
佐々木晶三師 父との“キズナ”夢実現の支え 調教師として名を広めたタップダンスシチー (Trainer Shozo Sasaki: Supported by the "Kizuna" (bond) with his father to achieve his dream. Tap Dance City made his name as a trainer.)
「初障害馬」扱い分かれば単純明快 馬券的中のヒントとは… (If you understand the handling of "first-time steeplechasers," it's simple and clear. What are the tips for winning bets...?)
サガルマータは青葉賞、僚馬ロングトールサリーはフローラＳ (Sagarmatha to Aoba Sho, stablemate Long Tall Sally to Flora S.)

【中山記念】レーベンスティール 反撃へ加速 Wコースラスト11秒8 田中博師「着実に良くなっている」 (【Nakayama Kinen】Lebensstil accelerates for a counterattack, finished in 11.8 seconds on the W course. Trainer Hiroshi Tanaka: "He is steadily improving.")
【よもやま話】障害戦で手応えをつかんだ小林凌 中山でも期待大！/馬三郎のつぶやき (【Behind the Scenes】Ryo Kobayashi, who found his stride in steeplechase races, has high expectations at Nakayama! / Umasaburo's tweet.)
ラヴェニューは武豊と新コンビで毎日杯 (Lavenue forms a new partnership with Yutaka Take for the Mainichi Hai.)

【中山記念】“強い4歳世代”カラマティアノスは中山金杯からの連勝狙う 奥村武調教師「どんどん良くなっている」 (【Nakayama Kinen】"Strong 4-year-old generation" Karamatiyanos aims for consecutive wins from the Nakayama Kimpai. Trainer Takeshi Okumura: "He's getting better and better.")
【弥生賞】パントルナイーフ 強めに併せた 「馬体のアンバランスさ、日ごとに改善」 (【Yayoi Sho】Peintre Naif worked strongly with a partner. "His body's imbalance is improving day by day.")
「牝馬の国枝」生んだメンタル調教の手腕 英国留学が基礎「いいことを習慣付ければ…」 (Trainer Kunieda's skill in mental training, which produced "Kunieda's fillies," was built on studying in the UK: "If you make good things a habit...")

「引退調教師を祝う会」に佐々木調教師、西園正調教師が出席 武豊騎手「今後も我々を見守って支えていただければ」 (Trainers Sasaki and Nishizono attended the "Retired Trainers Celebration Party." Jockey Yutaka Take: "We hope you will continue to watch over and support us in the future.")
サクラローレルの本格化を印象づけた衝撃の勝利から30年 96年中山記念を回想 (30 years since Sakura Laurel's stunning victory that impressed with his full development. Recalling the 1996 Nakayama Kinen.)
【中山記念】レーベンスティール 迫力復活 田中博師やや慎重も「先週から着実に良くはなっている」 (【Nakayama Kinen】Lebensstil's power revived. Trainer Hiroshi Tanaka is a little cautious, but says: "He has steadily improved since last week.")
【NARグランプリ2025】年度代表馬のディクテオン陣営 ドバイWCに向け「最高の結果で帰ってきたい」 (【NAR Grand Prix 2025】Team Dicteon, Horse of the Year, aims for the Dubai World Cup: "We want to come back with the best possible result.")
【有力馬動向】ミュージアムマイルがリフレッシュ完了 ドバイターフへ至極順調/馬三郎のつぶやき (【Key Horse Movement】Museum Mile has completed refreshment, preparing smoothly for the Dubai Turf. / Umasaburo's tweet.)
【オーシャンＳ】ルガル躍動 好調キープ「予定通りに来ています」 中山の６Ｆ戦「舞台設定もいい」 (【Ocean S】Lugal is dynamic, maintaining good form: "He's coming along as planned." Nakayama's 6F race: "The setting is also good.")
【中山記念】シャンパンカラー復活へ岩田康誠「申し分ない」 (【Nakayama Kinen】Yasunari Iwata on Champagne Color's comeback: "He's perfect.")

引退調教師を祝う会で武豊が感謝の言葉「騎手人生で大きな1勝」「本当に苦しい時期に勝たせていただいた」 (At the Retired Trainers Celebration Party, Yutaka Take expresses gratitude: "A big win in my jockey career," "He let me win during a truly difficult time.")
【中山記念展望】強い4歳世代のカラマティアノスが重賞連勝を狙う (【Nakayama Kinen Outlook】Karamatiyanos, from the strong 4-year-old generation, aims for consecutive graded race wins.)
【週末情報】オーシャンS連覇へ抜かりなし！ ママコチャは元気いっぱい/馬三郎のつぶやき (【Weekend Info】No oversight for Ocean S consecutive victory! Mama Cocha is full of energy. / Umasaburo's tweet.)
バステール、弥生賞1週前追い切り速報/栗東トレセンニュース (Busterre, Yayoi Sho 1-week prior workout quick report / Ritto Training Center News.)
【中山記念】エコロヴァルツ 雨ニモマケズ軽々登坂 １３度目重賞挑戦“善戦マン”に終止符打つか (【Nakayama Kinen】Ecoro Walz climbs lightly, unfazed by rain. Will he put an end to his "good-but-not-winning" streak on his 13th graded race challenge?)
【オーシャンS】インビンシブルパパが好気配 伊藤大調教師「半年遅れの馬。トモがだいぶしっかり」 (【Ocean S】Invincible Papa shows good signs. Trainer Dai Ito: "He's a horse that was six months behind. His hindquarters are quite firm now.")
【チューリップ賞】アランカール 実績抜群の武豊と逆襲へ 母シンハライトとの母子制覇狙う (【Tulip Sho】Alankarl aims for a comeback with the highly accomplished Yutaka Take, targeting a mother-daughter victory with dam Shinhalite.)

【報知杯弥生賞・1週前】パントルナイーフ重賞連勝へ余力十分の動き 陣営はバランス、精神面の上昇を確信 (【Hochi Hai Yayoi Sho - 1 week prior】Peintre Naif moves with plenty of reserve for consecutive graded wins. Connections are confident in improvement in balance and mental state.)
【チューリップ賞】タイセイボーグ急成長500キロ惜敗続きに終止符だ (【Tulip Sho】Taisei Borg, rapidly growing at 500kg, will put an end to his series of close defeats!)
武豊騎手と新コンビのアランカール チューリップ賞初の母仔制覇狙う (Alankarl, with new partner jockey Yutaka Take, aims for the first mother-daughter victory in the Tulip Sho.)
【オーシャンS】レース史上最高齢Vへ ウイングレイテストが2年4カ月ぶりの重賞2勝目狙う (【Ocean S】Wing Greatest aims for the oldest victory in race history, seeking his second graded win in 2 years and 4 months.)

【中山記念】重賞2勝の中山の舞台に替わって本領発揮だ!レーベンスティール 田中博調教師「今回も落ち着きはカギ」 (【Nakayama Kinen】Lebensstil, with two graded wins, will show his true form on the Nakayama stage! Trainer Hiroshi Tanaka: "Calmness is key again this time.")
ケリフレッドアスク、中山牝馬S1週前追い切り速報/栗東トレセンニュース (Kelefres Ask, Nakayama Himba S 1-week prior workout quick report / Ritto Training Center News.)
【チューリップ賞】コニーアイランド いざ王道路線へ 偉大な姉リバティアイランドと同じ道を歩む (【Tulip Sho】Connie Island heads to the classic route, following the same path as her great sister Liberty Island.)
ドゥラメンテが復帰戦で示した怪物の底力 16年中山記念を回顧 (Duramente showed the monstrous potential in his comeback race. Recalling the 2016 Nakayama Kinen.)

【チューリップ賞】ウオッカでも勝てなかった…四位洋文調教師、桜花賞2着4回騎手時代の悔しさ晴らす!ソルパッサーレでまず切符取りだ (【Tulip Sho】Even Vodka couldn't win... Trainer Hirofumi Shii, clearing up the regret from his jockey days with four 2nd place finishes in the Oka Sho! First, secure a ticket with Sol Passare.)

「しわが増えたな」武豊騎手が自身の特別展オープニングセレモニーに出席「騎手という仕事が大好き」 京都高島屋でスタート ("I've got more wrinkles," says jockey Yutaka Take, attending the opening ceremony of his special exhibition: "I love the job of being a jockey." Started at Kyoto Takashimaya.)
【NARグランプリ】初の全国リーディングに輝いた笹川翼騎手 「自分は天才ではないので」 (【NAR Grand Prix】Jockey Tsubasa Sasagawa, who became the national leading jockey for the first time: "I'm not a genius.")
【中山記念】史上2頭目の偉業に挑戦 レーベンスティールが4年連続GII制覇なるか (【Nakayama Kinen】Challenging a historic feat, only the second in history: Can Lebensstil achieve 4 consecutive GII victories?)

【オーシャンS】ルガルが2週連続栗東・坂路で抜群の動き 鮫島克駿騎手「ラストも馬なりでいい動きでした」 (【Ocean S】Lugal showed outstanding movement on the Ritto uphill track for two consecutive weeks. Jockey Katsuma Sameshima: "His finish was also good and effortless.")
【チューリップ賞】エイズルブルーム 強烈一撃を決める 未勝利戦の末脚再現で桜切符狙う (【Tulip Sho】Eisblume delivers a powerful blow. Aims for a cherry blossom ticket by replicating her closing speed from the maiden race.)
【フィリーズＲ】マルガ 巻き返しへパワフル登坂 陣営「距離短縮で乗りやすくなる」 (【Fillies' Revue】Margaux climbs powerfully for a comeback. Connections: "Shorter distance will make her easier to ride.")
24年宝塚記念を制したブローザホーンが右前脚の故障により引退へ (Brozahar, who won the 2024 Takarazuka Kinen, is set to retire due to a right foreleg injury.)

京都競馬場で藤井聡太竜王の永世竜王記念碑除幕式 出席の武豊は「歴史をつくっていかれる凄い方」 (Unveiling ceremony for Ryuo Sota Fujii's Permanent Ryuo Monument at Kyoto Racecourse. Yutaka Take, who attended, calls him "an amazing person who creates history.")
【POG】フクチャンショウはファルコンSに向けて調整/馬三郎のつぶやき (【POG】Fukuchan Show is adjusting for the Falcon S. / Umasaburo's tweet.)

【チューリップ賞】3連勝で桜の女王候補に名乗り挙げる!ソルパッサーレ 浜中俊騎手「いい結果を出してクラシックへ」 (【Tulip Sho】Sol Passare declares herself a candidate for the Cherry Blossom Queen with three consecutive wins! Jockey Shun Hamanaka: "Get a good result and go to the Classics.")

【チューリップ賞】阪神JF3着のタイセイボーグは活気満点の動き 松下調教師「権利をとって桜花賞に向かいたい」 (【Tulip Sho】Taisei Borg, 3rd in the Hanshin JF, shows energetic movement. Trainer Matsushita: "We want to secure a spot and head to the Oka Sho.")
【チューリップ賞】中内田調教師「この子はこの子として」リバティアイランド半妹コニーアイランドは坂路で好時計 (【Tulip Sho】Trainer Chu-uchida: "This one is her own." Liberty Island's half-sister Connie Island clocks a good time on the uphill track.)
【姫路競馬・今日の世麗】26日は4鞍 5Rのヤシロスマイリーに前進を見込む (【Himeji Horse Racing - Today's Serei】4 rides on the 26th. Expecting progress from Yashiro Smiley in Race 5.)
【中山記念】マイネルモーント 中山で反撃期す 高木師「状態は特に変わらず」 (【Nakayama Kinen】Meiner Mond aims for a counterattack at Nakayama. Trainer Takagi: "Condition is unchanged.")

藤井竜王「１００年後に残るよう」 京都競馬場で「永世竜王資格獲得記念碑」除幕式 武豊も祝福 (Ryuo Fujii: "So it remains for 100 years." Unveiling ceremony for the "Permanent Ryuo Qualification Monument" at Kyoto Racecourse. Yutaka Take also offered congratulations.)
【チューリップ賞】ソルパッサーレ 半馬身遅れも末脚鋭く 「外回りのマイルなら大丈夫」 (【Tulip Sho】Sol Passare was half a length behind but had a sharp closing kick. "An outer-course mile should be fine.")

【浦和・ユングフラウ賞結果】断然人気に応えてアンジュルナが6馬身差圧勝！5連勝で重賞3連勝 (【Urawa - Jungfrau Sho Results】Anjuruna responds as the overwhelming favorite with a dominant 6-length victory! 5 consecutive wins, 3 consecutive graded race wins.)

【中山記念】復調の兆し見せたシャンパンカラー 最終追い切りに岩田康誠騎手が好感触「前回よりもっといい」 (【Nakayama Kinen】Champagne Color shows signs of recovery. Jockey Yasunari Iwata had a good impression after the final workout: "Even better than last time.")
【中山記念】ディープインパクト産駒が17年連続のJRA重賞制覇へ 良血サイルーンが一発狙う (【Nakayama Kinen】Deep Impact's progeny aim for a 17th consecutive JRA graded race win. Well-bred Sail Run aims for a big shot.)

【姫路競馬・今日の世麗】 「昨年は2、3センチ...」塩津璃菜騎手に身長抜かれるも...25日は6鞍に騎乗 7Rのエートルドゥエに期待 (【Himeji Horse Racing - Today's Serei】"Last year, 2 or 3 centimeters..." Despite being outgrown by jockey Rina Shiotsu... riding 6 races on the 25th. Expectations for Etredue in Race 7.)

【佐賀・たんぽぽ賞】JRA勢撃破! 地元佐賀勢ワンツーで馬単28万円超 3連単206万円超 断然人気カラクニダケ5着 (【Saga - Tanpopo Sho】JRA horses defeated! Local Saga horses finish 1-2, quinella over 280,000 yen, trifecta over 2.06 million yen. Overwhelming favorite Karakunidake finishes 5th.)
【オーシャンS】ファンダムは初めての6ハロン 辻調教師「ついていけるスピードはある」3頭併せで先着 (【Ocean S】Fandom's first 6 furlongs. Trainer Tsuji: "He has the speed to keep up." Finished ahead in a 3-horse workout.)

【チューリップ賞】武豊騎手と初コンビのアランカールは3頭併せでラスト11秒5 斉藤崇調教師「取りこぼせない一戦」 (【Tulip Sho】Alankarl, in his first partnership with jockey Yutaka Take, finished in 11.5 seconds in a 3-horse workout. Trainer Takashi Saito: "A race we can't afford to lose.")
【浦和競馬 ユングフラウ賞】アンジュルナ 4角先頭から6馬身差圧勝 桜花賞に力強く王手 (【Urawa Horse Racing Jungfrau Sho】Anjuruna leads from the 4th turn for a dominant 6-length victory, strongly eyeing the Oka Sho.)

With three stakes quality 3-year-olds from their 2024 Inglis Premier Yearling draft, led by G1 Champagne Stakes winner Nepotism, the philosophy at Gilgai Farm is simple. The price a stallion stands for is irrelevant, the only thing that matter is that the boss thinks the mating will produce a fast racehorse. And they are all for sale.

The 2026 Inglis February (Late) Online Sale was packed with action, featuring sought-after racing and breeding prospects alongside in-demand shares in proven gallopers. Stakes-performed mare Manolo Bling topped the sale, with Highgrove Stud securing her for $275,000.

Ahead of the 2026 Inglis Premier Yearling Sale, we have identified four yearlings whose pedigrees have received black-type or metropolitan updates over the past couple of months, potentially increasing their value and certainly enhancing their profile.
In today's 'The TTR Ten' - Melbourne Premier Yearling Sales Edition - David Azzopardi from Dream Thoroughbreds answers 10 rapid-fire questions.

Some colts stamp themselves as top level talents from the beginning, and others have to get there the hard way. Fortunately for Sam Freedman, co-trainer of G1 Oakleigh Plate winner Tropicus, the right horse will persevere no matter how winding the path.

The best 2-year-olds come from some unusual places in the first Sectionally Speaking back for the year, as form analyst Nic Ashman returns to take stock of last Saturday’s racing. Tropicus and Ninja shone in their barnstorming wins, and it’s inevitable that a Group 1 lies in Sheza Alibi’s future.

Mandy Gunn's Motree Thoroughbreds achieved their biggest yearling sale result to date in 2025 when selling a Harry Angel colt for $300,000 at the Inglis Melbourne Premier Yearling Sale. Gunn ventures across the waters from Tasmania again in 2026 to attempt to repeat the feat.

Fresh off producing a Group 2 winner at the weekend, Newgate Farm's Wild Ruler had two new exciting trial winners on Tuesday at Doomben and Hawkesbury, which the John O'Shea and Tom Charlton sent out a treble of stylish 2-year-olds.
